name: Grilled Cheese Cheeseburger Single
description_api: Cheeseburgers are great. Grilled Cheese Sandwiches are great. A Grilled Cheese Cheeseburger is NEXT LEVEL. Our new Grilled Cheese Cheeseburger comes with one patty of Wendy’s fresh beef, topped with caramelized onions, creamy mayo, and a melty cheese slice, all served between even more cheese with two grilled cheese sandwiches as buns.  It’s the ultimate craving crushing sandwich!
components_ingredients:
Value Bun:
WHEAT flour, water, sugar, yeast, rapeseed oil, WHEAT dextrose, salt, WHEAT Gluten, preservative : E282, emulsifiers: E471, E472e, deactivated yeast, flour treatment agent: E300. Buns contain sesame, milk, egg.
American Cheese Slice:
Cheese (70%) (MILK), Palm Oil, Modified Potato Starch, Emulsifying Salts (Trisodium Citrate), Natural Cheese Flavouring (MILK), Preservative (Sorbic Acid), Colours (Beta Carotene, Paprika Extract), Anti-caking Agent (Sunflower Lecithin).
Mayonnaise:
Rapeseed oil (70%), water, spirit vinegar, pasteurized EGG yolk* (5%), sugar, salt, thickener (xanthan gum), antioxidant (calcium disodium EDTA) *from free range eggs. Mayonnaise contains mustard.
Beef Patty:
100% Beef
Soy Sauce:
Water, SOYBEANS, WHEAT, Salt.
Sea Salt:
Sea Salt, Anti-caking agent (Magnesium Oxide).

Perfectly paired with our nuggets - 4 pieces of chicken fillet lightly breaded for a crispy outer, then fried to seal in the juicy goodness all with small fries and a small drink.
